entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Clearing this morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 03 March 2023
